Package sailingclub.common.structures

package sailingclub.common.structures
Contains all the common data structures for both client and server
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    sailingclub.common
    Contains all the common interfaces,utilities and constants for both client and server
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BankTransfer
    Is an implementation of the structure for a bank account that allows the Member to make banks transfers
    Boat
    Is an implementation of a boat data structure the boat is owned by the Member
    BoatStorageFee
    This class represent a Boat fee for the annual storage in a boat garage
    CreditCard
    This class is the implementation for a credit card that allows the member to make payments with credit card
    EmptyPayload
    This class is useful for requests and responses that don't require a specific data payload
    MembershipFee
    this class represent an annual fee for a member that has to pay the fee
    Notification
    This class represent a notification structure, the notifications are used to notify a member for payments
    Payment
    This class represent a record (log) for a payment made in the system by User
    Race
    Is an implementation of a race, wich is a competition available for the members of the club
    RaceParticipation
    This class represent a record of a participation to a race of a boat owned by a user
    User
    this class represent the user which can be a Member or a Employee, the user can login into the system and use the proper GUI.
